responsive_settings.responsive_inline_js_footer:
<script>
function responsive_menu_concat(parent_class_name,child_section_id,class_child){
var responsive_containerr = document.getElementsByClassName(parent_class_name);
var responsive_menu_childd = responsive_containerr[class_child].getElementsByClassName('elementor-item');
var responsive_linkk = responsive_menu_childd[0].getAttribute("href");
var responsive_link_concatinatedd = responsive_linkk.concat(child_section_id);
responsive_menu_childd[0].setAttribute("href",responsive_link_concatinatedd);
}

responsive_menu_concat("responsive-menu-join-us","#join-us",0);

</script>
